param.name: filter
param.value: linkageName:(er\:MineralOccurrence OR erl\:MineralOccurrenceView OR erl\:CommodityResourceView OR erl\:MineView) OR (_groupPublished:(sarig OR gswa OR ntgs OR NSW OR mrt or gsq) AND linkageName:(er\:Mine OR er\:MiningActivity OR er\:MiningFeatureOccurrence)) OR (_groupPublished:(gswa OR gsv) AND linkageName:(mo\:MinOccView))

param.name: filter
param.value: linkageName:(mt\:MineralTenement OR MineralTenement) OR title:(Petroleum Titles Company)

param.name: filter
param.value: (linkageName:(gsml\:Borehole OR nvcl\:ScannedBoreholeCollection) AND protocol:OGC\:WFS*) OR linkageName:gsmlp\:BoreholeView

param.name: filter
param.value: +linkageName:(Populated_Places_* OR Roads_* OR TOPO250K_Roads OR Railways_* OR Waterbody_* OR Watercourses_* OR Watercourse_Areas OR Coastline1M OR National_Onshore_*_Pipelines OR National_Major_Ports)

param.name: filter
param.value: +linkageName:(SedimentaryBasins* OR TectonicProvinces* OR IgneousProvinces* OR AllProvinces OR CrustalElements OR MetallogenicProvinces OR ProvinceContacts)

param.name: filter
param.value: linkageName:(Protected_Areas OR Defence_*_Areas) OR title:(Australia_Commonwealth_Marine_Reserves OR World_Heritage_Areas_Australia)

param.name: filter
param.value: linkageName:(Onshore_Seismic_Surveys OR AirborneSurveys2014 OR TotalMagneticIntensity* OR GravityBouguerOnshore2010_greyscale OR GravityAnomaly2010* OR Radiometrics*)

param.name: filter
param.value: +linkageName:(ga_rock_properties_wfs* OR bulk_density OR chargeability OR electrical_conductivity OR electrical_resistivity OR gamma_bulk_density OR koenigsberger_ratio OR magnetic_susceptibility OR natural_gamma OR porosity OR remanent_magnetisation OR sonic_velocity OR temperature)
